extendedInfo.description: Worry about Electro-magnetic Field Hazards ?You can estimate it with your smarphone !Just use this apps and put your phone near the device or place you want to test.I just give an idea of the Magnetif Field Intensity, it is not a real Calibrated Instrument but it is not expensive !!!A simple click on the Ads will help me for the next developements, thanksElectromagnetic, magnet, wave, danger, hazard, risk, and fun !

reviews.title: Incorrect
reviews.comment: This app was not written by a knowledgeable source. The units are incorrect to start with. 1 micro Tesla is 10 milligauss. Also, not sure where the 0.2 micro Tesla limit comes from. No function for calibration.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very interesting results
reviews.comment: I found this app to do be very neat.  I walked around the house scanning air, walls, doors,  lots of stuff and found my walls and areas of doors to contain something odd. I tested again to assure there was no error and its detecting something odd.  Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As stated in description
reviews.comment: To the fellow Aussie who reviewed so poorly; clearly states it is not a calibrated tool but an indication of a field being present. The fact it registered at all proves it worked however inaccurate. Also 2x same brand phone /= sound science by any stretch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tested by an Engineer with a phd in electromagnetic compatibility
reviews.comment: At a training course held by dr tee tang in brisbane in march 2012, we tested this app on two htc phones on a known electromagnetic noise source, a 12v transformer that dr tang had done tests on. One phone under estimated the value by 800 times, the other phone over estimated by 200 times. Don\'t waste your time downloading this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Mesn wth hne
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Usable, but it drained my battery after being closed.

reviews.comment: Does what its supposed to.But pretty boring.Just takes up space and battery when not being used.Uninstalled.

reviews.comment: This is great. 1 suggestion. Somehow make the numbers and scale larger and easier to read. The font size is so small. And scale seems squeezed @ tatop

reviews.comment: Thank you for listening to feedback and adding official units! 5 stars now. Minor issue, but could u add a more attractive app icon/picture? Droid 2

reviews.comment: Results are confusing, need engineer degree to understand

reviews.comment: It does indeed work. Hold it over a magnet or near a breaker box (where the lines enter the box) and you will have all the proof you need.
